subject: Masters Golf Tournament
lead_paragraph: Ryan Moore, Mathew Goggin and Eric Axley shot three-under-par 67s, making them the highest-scoring first-round leaders of the EDS Byron Nelson Championship in Irving, Tex., since 1984. Trevor Immelman, playing for the first time since winning the Masters, shot a 78, better than only three other players.
